mapper.insert:
insert into tSheet (CarNo, carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman, chk1, date, sheetSS, sheetSS2, writerIDX, CurrStatus) values (#{CarNo}, #{carSubmit}, #{carSubmitTel}, #{salesman}, #{chk1}, #{date}, #{sheetSS}, #{sheetSS2}, #{writerIDX}, #{CurrStatus})
select last_insert_id() as sheetID
mapper.select: select carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman from tSheet where carSubmit like CONCAT('%', #{carSubmit}, '%') group by carSubmit order by carSubmit asc;
select carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman from tSheet where carSubmitTel like CONCAT('%', #{carSubmitTel}, '%') group by carSubmitTel order by carSubmitTel asc;
select carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman from tSheet where salesman like CONCAT('%', #{salesman}, '%') group by salesman order by salesman asc;
select CarNo, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman, chk1, sheetSS from tSheet where sheetID=#{sheetID}
mapper.update: update tSheet set carSubmit=#{carSubmit}, carSubmitTel=#{carSubmitTel}, salesman=#{salesman}, chk1=#{chk1}, CurrStatus=#{CurrStatus} where sheetSS=#{sheetSS} and sheetID=#{sheetID}
mapper.select: select chk1 from tSheet where sheetID=#{sheetID}
